sen.j: 倭京（やまとのみやこ）とは、古代日本に存在した都。
sen.e: Yamato no Miyako is a city existed in ancient Japan.
Yamato no Miyako is a city existed in ancient Japan.
Yamato no Miyako is a city existed in ancient Japan.

sen.j: 日本書紀やいわゆる九州年号などにこの名称が散見される。
sen.e: This name is referred to in books including "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan) and what is commonly called "Kyushu Nengo" (the Eras of Kyushu Dynasty).
This name is referred to in books including "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan) and what is commonly called "Kyushu Nengo" (the Eras of Kyushu Dynasty).
This name is referred to in books including "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan) and what is commonly called "Kyushu Nengo" (the Eras of Kyushu Dynasty).

sen.j: 通説では飛鳥京のこととされているが、大宰府を指すとする説もある。
sen.e: The city is observed as Asuka-kyo in prevailing view, but there is another opinion that the city means Dazai-fu (local government office in Kyushu region).
